thread.title: Nigel Farage shares £4million bachelor pad with glam French politician as Katie Price makes dig at former Ukip leader
thread.title_full: Nigel Farage shares £4million bachelor pad with glam French politician as Katie Price makes dig at former Ukip leader

author: oloveridgegreene
title: Nigel Farage shares £4million bachelor pad with glam French politician as Katie Price makes dig at former Ukip leader

organizations.name: institute for direct democracy in europe

text:
Opinion IN THE DOGHOUSE? Nigel Farage shares   as Katie Price makes dig at former Ukip leader 
The Brexiteer is sharing his West London home with 37-year-old French pal Laure Ferrari BY LAUREN PROBERT Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments FORMER Ukip leader Nigel Farage has been sharing his bachelor pad with a glamorous French politician who is being probed over illegal funding of the party. 
The revelation emerged as Katie Price hit back at claims she was “out of her depth” in a TV interview with him last week . Getty Images 7 Laure Ferrari is staying with the ex-Ukip leader at his Chelsea home in London 
Laure Ferrari, 37, who is 15 years younger than the married ex-Ukip leader, was photographed putting bins out at the £4million house in Chelsea, West London on Friday. 
Mr Farage was later seen leaving in a chauffeur-driven Land Rover. 
Last night he confirmed that Laure had been living at the property but said any suggestion of an affair was “crackers”. News Group Newspapers Ltd His missus . . . Nigel’s wife Kirsten RELATED STORIES 'HE'S LYING TO YOU' Labour MEP holds cheeky sign up behind Nigel Farage as he blasts European parliament over Trump ban DOUBLE STANDARDS Nigel Farage calls Sadiq Khan 'hypocrite' over Trump ban attack for hosting nations who ban Israelis tears for Piers Nigel Farage to go head to head with Piers Morgan on Life Stories - here's all you need to know LOOSE CANNON Nigel Farage appears on Loose Women and defends Trump's 'Muslim ban' saying we must protect our borders TAKING TRUMP’S LEAD Farage says Britain should take Trump’s lead and bring in ‘extreme vetting’ as he defends travel ban 'I'm his favourite Brit!' Piers Morgan says he's better friends with President Donald Trump than Nigel Farage 'IT WILL BE GOOD FOR US' Farage praises 'great' speech and claims Trump will usher in new era of warm relations with UK 
He told The Mail on Sunday he “knew her well” and was helping her with somewhere to stay short-term. 
Laure, is head of Eurosceptic think-tank the Institute for Direct Democracy in Europe, which is accused of illegal activity by diverting public money to Ukip when Mr Farage was its leader. 
Ukip is being pro- bed by the Electoral Commission for allegedly taking £400,000 in donations from the IDDE and a related group. 
Mr Farage said he “absolutely denied” any claims of financial wrongdoing.
